short_summary: Modifying the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline, May 16 to June 13 at 14:00
description: Customized shipping containers for storage of valuable equipment.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Title {Title}
F2905-230052 Shipping Storage Containers
 / 
 F2905-230052 Conteneurs d'expédition et d'entreposage 

### Reference and Solicitation Information
 Reference: WS4469536772-Doc4557907786
 Solicitation: WS4469536772

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Product Code**: 24110000 (Containers and Storage)
*   **Location of Economic Interest**: Ontario (excluding NCR)

### End User Information
 The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) based in Burlington, ON is the end-user for this tender.

### Tender Requirements
 The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires the supply and delivery of five (5) customized shipping containers for storage.

  A detailed description of the required shipping containers and the type of equipment they must store can be obtained from the official tender notice.

### Important Information

  All bids must be submitted no later than June 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT.
  Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
  The tender notice includes additional information about the user entity, trade agreements, and other relevant details.

### How to Access the Tender Notice

*   A copy of the tender notice is available [Here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19726673?extsite=MTk3MjY2NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Note that, unlike the CVS file that provides raw data, the rewritten copy includes information and descriptions while considering the 400-word limit. The salient details on the bid requirements have been included, while the official important announcement has been paraphrased and qualified properly to fit a nice, professional manual.
Feel free to point out any further improvements.  You're awesome!
 
.  I look forward to your response.  I'll be sure to incorporate any feedback you may have. 
Thanks so much!
I genuinely appreciate your help. 
 
Here's the go ahead to post the issue so that we can make the necessary improvements.
